attributes.title: Love Trump! But Horrible App.
attributes.review: Now don’t get me wrong. I absolutely LOVE Trump. I think there is not a single man better than him on this earth! But this app is just HORRIBLE!! It glitches HORRIBLY and crashes all the time. I had to delete it because it was so bad. You’re better off just finding other ways to support him.

attributes.title: Got hacked !!!
attributes.review: Downloaded this app and all of my personal information was stolen. Both my email and my phone number are being spammed by unknown sources. The app isn’t user friendly, has coding errors as well as spelling/grammar errors. The app is also under Chinese surveillance, I think they’re the ones who stole my information :(

attributes.userName: i might or might not be useful
attributes.title: Reading this will be worth your while🥰
not satisfied
attributes.review: immediately after downloading, all of my hair fell out and my skin turned super pale. i was forced to go buy a cheap flimsy wig and get a butchered spray tan everywhere except for my eye. not satisfied

attributes.title: ORANGE HEAD
attributes.review: This app is literally mad for people that want Donald trumps wig because he just had to fall in ORANGE paint when he was a baby and I think it stained 🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: I got this app so I could keep up to date on critical information and it immediately crashed my phone, whipped out my bank account, locked my son out, gave all of our devises viruses and then shut them all down.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: To all my fellow republicans out there, DO NOT get this app. It did not make my phone great again, and made ME pay for the border wall. Then it flooded my news app with FAKE NEWS 😳 Next thing I knew, my bank account was hacked and donated all of my money to organizations such as the ACLU and various jail bond freedom funds. And to top it all off, it forced me to wear a mask as a precaution for Covid-19?? Which violates my constitutional rights!! Just horrible. 0 stars ⭐️

attributes.title: Wouldn’t download
attributes.review: Took a week to download and then asked very personal question to log in and tried to get my personal data from the sign up
